ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Ways to gain experience without fighting
ygData.msgSnippet: The only reason I think Jeff said he didnt like human warrior is because they were so blind.  Human, Troll, Ogre, Gnome any of them can make a good warrior. Mu
ygData.messageBody:
The only reason I think Jeff said he didnt like human warrior is because
they were so blind. Human, Troll, Ogre, Gnome any of them can make a good
warrior.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: IT2 Adam J. Daingerfield [mailto:persona@...]
Sent: Friday, June 29, 2001 9:54 PM
To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Ways to gain experience without fighting


Hey it happens...I suggest you read the warrior section at www.everlore.com
and see what race/warrior selection would be better (heh suggest you do this
before you get the human/warrior higher


Sarakan ....Bertoxx
